summary: Katy Perry's fourth album, "Prism," came out in 2013. It's mostly dance music, with themes about living in the moment and relationships. Critics liked its honest lyrics. The album was a big success, hitting number one in many countries and selling over 4 million copies. Songs like "Roar" and "Dark Horse" were huge hits. Perry promoted the album with a world tour.
title: Prism (Katy Perry album)
